dict.string: Vatican has enough money to eradicate poverty all around the world
They have enough money to eradicate poverty twice
The seahorse is so faithful to its partner, that when one dies, the other also does it in a short time
One can not live without the other
Humans are the only living beings who practice sex for pleasure
The apple seed contains cyanide and is toxic
It is estimated that about 30-40 seeds could kill us
Cats can shaved their mustache without any problem
A koala needs to drink at least once a day
A koala does not need to drink absolutely never.
Edison, the inventor of the light bulb, feared darkness
Scorpions are the only animals that commit suicide when they can not escape from a dangerous situation
The eyes of a hamster can fall if it hangs upside down
If you divide the number of female bees among that of male bees from a honeycomb, you get the golden number
The palms were born for the first time in the north pole
Cervantes and Shakespeare died the same day
